name: Fresh Fry Polizei!
description:
I am not  a programmer, so I created the trial version with the Adventure Creator. So just imagine what the game would be like if it had been created with a programmer. Do you like the idea of the game? I would appreciate any feedback! :-)

In this game, you play a "Fresh Fry Polizei" police officer and your job is to uncover an organization that deals with (too) dark fries. The idea of the game was inspired by a new EU law that prohibits the sale of dark fries, as frying produces carcinogenic substances.
